alert.note: Alert for Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:14PM EDT until March 28 at 9:05AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Scioto River at Circleville. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Scioto River at Circleville. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low-lying areas north of Circleville near Little Walnut begin to flood. Flooding also worsens at the intersection of Canal Road and State Route 104 and on Island Road north of Circleville. Minor backwater flooding occurs along Big Darby Creek near Circleville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue falling, remaining below flood stage. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
